word: H2738 - חָרוּל - chârûwl - khaw-rool' - Nettle - நெட்டில்

sections.paragraph: nettles, weeds, kind of weed (perhaps chickpea)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Apparently passive participle of an unused root probably meaning to be prickly; properly pointed, that is, a bramble or other thorny weed: - nettle.
